Title: Ai Means Love
Writer: Mie Smith (story), SunJae Smith (story), Kate Tsubata (story), Kate Tsubata
Actors: Kentoku Aoyama, Bethany Butler, Bob Charnley, Joan Crooks
Plot: Two families, one from Japan and one from a small town in West Virginia, own businesses next to each other. Mr. Hayashi, a former samurai movie actor, has a hard time introducing Japanese ...
